name: cryptsetup
desc:
Cryptsetup is utility used to conveniently setup disk encryption
based on DMCrypt kernel module.
These include plain dm-crypt volumes, LUKS volumes, loop-AES and
TrueCrypt (including VeraCrypt extension) format.
Project also includes veritysetup utility used to conveniently setup
DMVerity block integrity checking kernel module and, since version 2.0,
integritysetup to setup DMIntegrity block integrity kernel module.
